emails.subject: Inquiry: Pricing and Security Compliance
emails.body:
Hi James,

We are reviewing your proposal. Two main things: 1) What is the maximum volume discount for 1000+ users? and 2) Can you provide your latest SOC2 Type II report for our security audit?

Thanks,
Acme CEO

emails.subject: Re: Inquiry: Pricing and Security Compliance
emails.body:
Hi there,

Great to hear from you. For 1000+ users, we can offer a 25% discount on the list price. We can also lock this in for 12 months if we sign by Friday.

Best regards,
James

emails.subject: Re: Inquiry: Pricing and Security Compliance
emails.body: James, thanks for the pricing update. However, you didn't mention the SOC2 report. We cannot proceed without verifying your security compliance. Please send that over immediately.
